name: marscleaner
0:
”Alexa, open mars cleaner and start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask mars cleaner to stop cleaning”
”Alexa, ask mars cleaner to go to the base”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mars cleaner
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the "mars cleaner" skill for Alexa, you can control sweeping robot with your voice. Here's a step by step guide: 1. Download Marstak app from Google Play or App Store. 2. Turn on your robot and connect them with Marstak app. 3. Type in or search "mars cleaner" in Alexa skill store. Click ENABLE TO USE and login to link your app account.. 4. Now, you can control your smart devices with your voice.

 START
 “Alexa, open mars cleaner and start cleaning.”
 “Alexa, begin mars cleaner and start cleaning.”
 “Alexa, launch mars cleaner and initiate the cleaning.”
 “Alexa, open mars cleaner and clean.”
 “Alexa, open mars cleaner and start vacuuming.
 STOP
 “Alexa, open mars cleaner and stop vacuuming.”
 “Alexa, tell mars cleaner to stop the cleaning.”
 “Alexa, ask mars cleaner to stop cleaning.”
 SEND TO CHARGING BASE
 “Alexa, open mars cleaner and charge the robot.”
 “Alexa, ask mars cleaner to charge.”
 “Alexa, ask mars cleaner to recharge.”
 “Alexa, ask mars cleaner to go to the base.”
 LOCATE THE ROBOT
 “Alexa, open mars cleaner and look for my robot.”
 “Alexa, tell mars cleaner to look for my robot.”
 “Alexa, open mars cleaner and find the robot.”
